keyword: calories in a boston cream doughnut
title: Calories in a Boston Cream Doughnut
meta_description: Discover calories in a boston cream doughnut, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better choices.
h1: Calories in a Boston Cream Doughnut
assumptions: Standard yeast doughnut, ~85 g, filled with vanilla custard, topped with chocolate glaze; fried preparation.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and frying method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical Boston cream doughnut contains about 360 kcal and 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a boston cream doughnut?
faqs.a: Approximately 360 kcal for one standard doughnut.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Boston cream doughnut?
faqs.a: About 42 g carbs, including 22 g sugars and 1 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Boston cream doughnut high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 19 g total fat, with 6 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in one Boston cream doughnut?
Does brand affect calories in Boston cream doughnuts?
faqs.a: Yes, variations can range 300-400 kcal; check specific labels.
